title: Tech Bytes: Productivity gets a boost with Java 18 - The Financial Express
content: Tech Bytes: Productivity gets a boost with Java 18  The Financial Express
description: Reiterating the importance of the report’s findings, Dipesh Kaura, general manager, Kaspersky South Asia, said, “With more than 10 million 5G-ready devices already in the Indian market and 5G network in the last stages of preparation before launch this year, we’re clearly looking at large-scale IoT deployment in the country.”
